titulo: Scientific analysis and exploitation of space data
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to the following expected outcomes:European space science breakthroughs fostered by data analysis and exploitation of European missions (incl. low-cost/small satellite) and instruments, in conjunction, when relevant, with international missions. This data may also originate from European in-orbit validation experiments with a focus on space science and exploration.A higher number of European scientific publications based on space data,
